category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AccountabilityCheckUseRollUpQuantity
preference.preference_description: Activates Accountability Check to count equivalent lines based on the number of lines, their Quantity property value, and their parent's Quantities, in order to determine if they are full or multiple matches. When set to false, the count is based on the number of BOMLines, including packed lines but otherwise not taking the Quantity property into account.
